features: WHAT YOU'LL GET: Three 16-ounce bottles of Tom's of Maine Whole Care Natural Mouthwash in Fresh Mint Flavor
FIGHT CAVITIES: Fluoride mouthwash offers clinically proven cavity protection by restoring minerals and strengthening enamel
ALCOHOL-FREE MOUTHWASH: Get minty fresh breath with no ethyl alcohol
DO MORE GOOD: Reduce waste with this recyclable mouthwash bottle
TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF NATURALLY: Contains no artificial sweeteners, preservatives, colors or flavors and is not tested on animals
body.description: Six benefits in one mouthwash? You heard right. Tom's of Maine Whole Care Natural Mouthwash fights cavities, restores minerals, freshens breath, cleans between teeth, strengthens enamel and is alcohol-free*. Wow, that's a lot. Plus, this fluoride mouthwash contains no artificial colors, sweeteners or preservatives. To use, vigorously swish between your teeth for one minute, then spit out. Now, go enjoy the clean taste of Fresh Mint. At Tom's of Maine, we want to empower families to live more naturally. With more than 50 years experience combining scientific know-how, naturally derived ingredients and a bit of ingenuity, we make products that are good for you and the planet. As a Certified B Corp, we hold ourselves to the highest social and environmental standards. Plus, we're committed to supporting local communities for meaningful change, donating 10% of our profits to charities supporting health, education and the environment. We call this "doing good, for real," and it impacts everything we do. *Product does not contain ethyl alcohol.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oral Care Whether you’re looking for a natural sensitive toothpaste or a fluoride-free kids toothpaste, Tom’s of Maine has a number of safe, effective ways to keep your teeth and mouth clean without artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. Deodorant & Antiperspirant Tom’s of Maine products give your underarms the attention they deserve. We combine the naturally sourced and naturally derived ingredients to help keep you feeling fresh for up to 24 hours. Bath & Body Our natural cleansing line features organic botanicals like virgin coconut oil, raw shea butter, and other ingredients sourced and derived from nature. Every personal care product is free of artificial flavors, fragrances, colors, sweeteners and preservatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh, clean taste!
reviews.reviewText: I've always loved Tom's of Maine products. This is a great mouthwash: crisp, but not overpowering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mouthwash & not sensitive to my gums

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluoride mouthwash no SLS
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find fluoride mouthwash with safer ingredients. Tastes good too. Keep it up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Order for my mom and she loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and quality
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes Amazon offers great price and once in a while this item is like that. My child uses this all the time as it is the only flavor that is not spicy for her liking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a gentle mouthwash that would help fight cavities without burning. This mouth wash is gentle and has a mild flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best non-alcohol mouthwash on the market
reviews.reviewText: I needed to find a mouthwash with no alcohol with a mild flavor because those really strong flavors and mouthwash are offensive to me this one checked all the boxes it is a very light flavor to it also it does more than just freshen your breath it has the following benefits as well as freshening breath including fights cavities restores minerals strengthens enamel cleans between teeth which helps with added flossing benefit so this is the natural with fluoride whole care anti-cavity mouthwash fresh mint 16 oz bottles I ordered it in a three pack and it was a very reasonable price cheaper even than they had at Walmart and I got my free Prime shipping so if this is what you're looking for highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouthwash! It doesn’t stain your teeth like Listerine. Safe for long-term use & you see results instantly. Also, you can really feel the cleanliness after
